response.original_title: 呪ワレタ動画series9 佐倉Dスペシャル
response.overview: The director, a former policewoman skilled in fighting, a professional photographer who continues to shoot even after his death, and a young man full of modern sensibilities who supports them, create a reality stranger than fiction!  People being manipulated by someone or something over their heads, or the anger of a girl who never grew up...  This work is a reconstruction from "Cursed Video Series: Sakura D" and "Cursed Video Series: Sakura D - The Fear of Ito Dashi".
response.title: Cursed Video Series 9: Sakura D Special

titles.title: Norowareta Dōga Series 9: Sakura D Supesharu
